message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose all the details at this time, I can tell you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000. This is a significant price reduction from what it's worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a wise investment. Let me know your thoughts.
